TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ComClassAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ComClassAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ComClassAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 屬性 (Attribute) 會指示編譯器加入能將類別公開成 COM 物件的中繼資料 (Metadata)。

span.span: The attribute instructs the compiler to add metadata that allows a class to be exposed as a COM object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`ComClassAttribute`來簡化將從 Visual Basic 的 COM 元件公開的程序。Use `ComClassAttribute` to simplify the process of exposing COM components from Visual Basic. COM 物件是非常不同於.NET Framework 組件;不含`ComClassAttribute`，您必須遵循幾個步驟，以產生從 Visual Basic 的 COM 物件。COM objects are very different from .NET Framework assemblies; without the `ComClassAttribute`, you need to follow a number of steps to generate a COM object from Visual Basic. 針對類別以標記`ComClassAttribute`，編譯器會自動執行其中許多步驟。For classes marked with `ComClassAttribute`, the compiler performs many of these steps automatically. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性可簡化建立 COM 物件。This attribute simplifies the creation of COM objects. 若要公開為 COM 物件的類別，您必須編譯的專案**註冊 COM Interop**中選取選項**建置**一節**組態屬性** 對話方塊。To expose a class as a COM object, you must compile the project with the **Register for COM Interop** option selected in the **Build** section of the **Configuration Properties** dialog box. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您也可以公開為 COM 物件使用的 unmanaged 程式碼與 Visual Basic 建立的類別，它不是真正的 COM 物件。Although you can also expose a class created with Visual Basic as a COM object for unmanaged code to use, it is not a true COM object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 應用程式中的 COM 互通性](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/com-interoperability-in-net-framework-applications.md)。For details, see [COM Interoperability in .NET Framework Applications](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/com-interoperability-in-net-framework-applications.md). ## Examples 若要執行此範例中，建立新**類別庫**應用程式並將下列程式碼新增至類別的模組。To run this example, create a new **Class Library** application and add the following code to a class module. [!code-vb[VbCnAttributes#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbCnAttributes/VB/Class2.vb#21)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的建構函式`ComClassAttribute`類別來設定`ClassID`， `InterfaceID`，或`EventID`屬性時套用`ComClassAttribute`類別。Use the constructor for the `ComClassAttribute` class to set the `ClassID`, `InterfaceID`, or `EventID` properties when applying the `ComClassAttribute` to a class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClassID As String
public: property System::String ^ ClassID { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得用來唯一識別類別的類別 ID。

span.span: Gets a class ID used to uniquely identify a class.
Read-only.

value.span: 字串，當建立 COM 物件時，編譯器可用來唯一識別類別。

span.span: A string that can be used by the compiler to uniquely identify the class when a COM object is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會設定這個屬性時`ComClassAttribute`套用至類別。The constructor sets this property when the `ComClassAttribute` is applied to a class.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 表示 COM 介面名稱會遮蔽類別或基底類別的另一個成員。

span.span: Indicates that the COM interface name shadows another member of the class or base class.

value.span: 值，表示 COM 介面名稱會遮蔽類別或基底類別的另一個成員。

span.span: A value that indicates that the COM interface name shadows another member of the class or base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 遮蔽，是成員會使用另一個成員相同的名稱。Shadowing is when a member uses the same name as another member.
